data.name: Controller Sync Demo
data.detailed_description: The demo version contains the tutorial for Controller Sync and lets you understand the mechanics of the game.
data.about_the_game: The demo version contains the tutorial for Controller Sync and lets you understand the mechanics of the game.
data.short_description: Demo version that contains the tutorial of Controller Sync

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i3 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
